review: Love the stick.  I had Chromecast but this far exceeds that.  Took me a bit to get it to "talk" to my router, but once that happened everything went vert smoothly.  Love having the remote (Chromecast does not have that).  For the price it is a great buy.

review: It works just fine and is a great addition for the second bedroom. I took one star away because the adds on TV are misleading. It doesn't just plug into the HDMI port, it also requires a power supply - extra cable and extra power socket. If your TV in on the wall and you only have one power outlet, you are out of luck.
author: Bubba Kastorsky

review: Its Great!! Love the ease of the remote.  One thing to note is to let everyone know you have to plug it in.  From the looks of it and from the Amazon page it looks like it just goes in HDMI slot and poof ready to go.  I did not know it had to be plugged in which was a hassle but needless to say I got it arranged and it works great!!
